text: A rice homolog of cdk7mo15 phosphorylates both CYCLIN dependent protein kinase and the carboxy terminal domain of rna polymerase ii . Immunoprecipitates of rice proteins with the anti r2 antibody phosphorylated human cdk2 one of the rice cdks cdc2os1 and the carboxy terminal domain ctd of the largest subunit of rna polymerase ii of arabidopsis .
